docs.snippet: A senior U.S. diplomat deleted an untold number of work emails, apparently unaware that even routine messages received and sent by a top government official should be saved, according to a Senate investigation released Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A senior U.S. diplomat deleted an untold number of work emails, apparently unaware that even routine messages received and sent by a top government official should be saved, according to a Senate investigation released Tuesday.

headline.main: Senate Investigation Says Top US Diplomat Deleted Emails

docs.snippet: Differences over trade policies have led to an acrimonious relationship between the business association and the presumptive Republican nominee....
docs.lead_paragraph: Differences over trade policies have led to an acrimonious relationship between the business association and the presumptive Republican nominee.
docs.abstract: US Chamber of Commerce chief executive Thomas J Donohue expresses disdain for Donald J Trump’s economic policies following threats by Trump to rip up trade accords, put tariffs on Chinese goods and start a trade war; acrimonious relationship with presumptive nominee is historic change for  pro-business organization whose goals usually line up with Republican establishment.

headline.main: Trump and U.S. Chamber of Commerce Pull No Punches on Trade Policy
headline.print_headline: Trump and U.S. Chamber of Commerce Pull No Punches

docs.snippet: Europe in the 1930s and America in the 1890s faced many troubling conditions like we do today. They responded with very different answers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Europe in the 1930s and America in the 1890s faced many troubling conditions like we do today. They responded with very different answers.
docs.abstract: David Brooks Op-Ed column suggests America is faced with generational challenge, as evidenced by police shootings, violence against police and mendacity of main political parties' presidential candidates; warns path country takes will mean difference between descent into fascism and ascent to renewed national greatness.

headline.main: Are We on the Path to National Ruin?
headline.print_headline: Is the U.S.  on the Path to Ruin?

docs.snippet: While the nation contends with an uptick in violence and its increasingly autocratic leader, Recep Tayyip Erdogan, it also faces existential questions....
docs.lead_paragraph: While the nation contends with an uptick in violence and its increasingly autocratic leader, Recep Tayyip Erdogan, it also faces existential questions.
docs.abstract: Memo from Istanbul; Turkish Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan has made Turkish society far more equal by carrying out economic policies that lifted poorer areas, but his increasingly autocratic ways have many Turks worried about their future.

headline.main: As Erdogan Sculpts New Turkish Identity, Turks Look at His Work With Unease
headline.print_headline: As Erdogan Sculpts New Turkish Identity, Turks Watch With Unease
